cardName: 1996 #113 Chansey CGC 10 Gem Mint Pokemon Japanese Base Set Holo

analysis.cardName: 1996 #113 Chansey CGC 10 Gem Mint Pokemon Japanese Base Set Holo
analysis.cardHistory: 1996 Japanese Base Set Chansey represents Pokemon's earliest international era with extremely rare CGC 10 specimens. Blue-chip vintage collectible commanding premium due to era's poor print quality and surviving population scarcity.

trendPrediction.reasoning: Strong upward indicators: vintage appreciation cycle, perfect grade scarcity, international collector interest, foundational set recognition.

analysis.cardHistory: Aquapolis Lugia from 2003 e-Card series features revolutionary dot-code technology and holographic effects. PSA 10 specimens exceptionally rare due to printing sensitivity and card stock issues of the experimental series.

trendPrediction.reasoning: Balanced market indicators suggest price stability.
